ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Druid flying solo, mostly.
ygData.msgSnippet: Tashan Hallard (I think that s his name) in Hallard s Resales in East Freeport. It s in the bad part of town. Turn in 4 at a time. Get great faction and some
ygData.messageBody:
Tashan Hallard (I think that's his name) in Hallard's Resales in East
Freeport. It's in the "bad" part of town.
Turn in 4 at a time. Get great faction and some silver. sometimes you get a
lottery ticket for the highpass lottery. the guy says they are losing but
not all of them are.
luv,
-Su

> Do you recall to whom the picks are turned in?
>
> Barto
>
> --- In EverQuest@y..., "Su" <suceress@s...> wrote:
> >
> > If you get to Freeport, turn in Orc Pawn Picks.
> > luv,
> > -Su
> >
> > > I am developing a halfling druid for mostly solo play. I group
> once
> > > in a while, but prefer to develop solo skills. I am a relatively
> new
> > > player, so I am not sure just where I am going.
> > >
> > > My current goal is attaining level 14, to gain SOW and bind. I
> then
> > > plan to begin traveling and picking up some of the little quests.
> > >
> > > I am drawn initially toward the Commons. Any suggestions as to
> what
> > > interesting low-level solo quests might be in that area?
> > >
> > > Barto of Rivervale.
> > >
> > >
> > > Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
> > >
> > >
> > > Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to
> http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
> > >
